What is Theethawat ?

Theethawat (Tin) is 3rd year student in Computer Engineering at Prince of Songkla University in Thailand. I can coding in C, Basic C for AVR, Java, Javascript, PHP and Markup Language. I'm happy to trying setup a Apache web server, DNS Server and next will be Mail Server and Nginx. I'm using Ubuntu Budgie 18.04 LTS dual with Windows 10 and I am joining in Windows Insider Program to trying Windows 10 20H1.
